caption: Ordered from here quite a few times and every time it is delicious. Lots of protein given with each bowl and the produce is always fresh.
I order shrimp and beef bowl. Amazing always fresh. Great customer service. Recommend to everyone
All the toppings were fresh and they had some really good flavors.  Will definitely be back again.
The most important thing to me was the freshness and tastiness of the fish. And it was extremely good. The options were great and the counter service was terrific. Big fan.

Amazing food! Everything tasted very fresh and super tasty. That's kind of the beauty of these places, where you essentially design your own dish, if they provide good ingredients. All of the proteins and veggies and toppings and everything was fresh and you select what you want, so if you don't like your dish, it's likely your own fault. :)  I had tried 2 tunas and scallops in my 3protein bowl. Scallops were not as tender, but they're cooked and then chilled... the tuna melts in your mouth and everything was so fresh!  It was only 2 people working there (seemed like the owners), so it takes a minute, but SO WORTH IT!!

Best poke bowl I've had in the DC area. So many choices/customizations, great contactless online ordering system, and very very fresh.  They're attached to a little business building that looks a bit lonely during the pandemic. But have no fear, they're there serving out that fresh fish!
Ordered Hibachi style Chicken and Bowl... great taste and value for money. Must try 👍

I get to eat here a lot since I work close by. I have to say the customer service is always awesome and they keep the spot well organized all the time. Pricing is fair and they serve generous portions.

Ordered online and was ready when I came. Rice was nice and warm still when I got home from a 20min drive. I got sauces on the side as you can see, since I didnt know what tasted good. They gave plenty.  As for the proteins I had spicy tuna, spicy salmon, and marinaded tuna. Definitely didnt give much, was hoping for a little more for $15 but hey we live in a tough time right now. They had a lot of toppings. If you dont know what it is I suggest you google it. Overall I was satisfied not too full not too hungry still after. It was just right

A great poké place with a convenient location for Gaithersburg and the surrounding area. Very reasonable prices, good selection, and excellent food. The staff is friendly and they have a good online ordering setup and contactless pick-up.

The poke was delicious. I really enjoyed the large variety of fish they offered- it's much more than most other poke places. They also had a lot of different toppings and sauces that was very fun to customize.
It's a good place for lunch there very careful during corona and very good food
Highly recommend! Perfectly salted edamame. We had the Chilly Maguro Mango bowl and Okey Poke Bowl. Both were excellent and evenly balanced with the ingredients listed.
I really like this place. I work next door and I always go there. They are so nice and prompt. Their drinks are very good too

I really recommend this place. I moved to this area recently and tried their poke. Impressed by the freshness of the raw fish and a variety of toppings (all the radish and vegetable toppings!). Especially, I would like to mention their crunchy garlic and tempura toppings! I’ve tasted many poke bowls in DC and Arlington area, but i didn’t know these toppings can be this crunchy! Well done! Moreover, their marinated raw fish doesn’t have an overpowering sauce (which is usually the case with marinated ones). So when you add some sauces of your choice at the end, it doesn’t end up being too salty! So I could taste the raw fish marinated at just right level! Last but not least, the place has a nice, cozy and CLEAN setting, too. After the COVID-19, i would like to sit there and enjoy a poke bowl! Thanks guys! I will go back soon!

This place rocks. Was traveling through the area and stopped here spur the moment, I’m sure glad we did. So many selections to choose from it’s easy to go into option overload. The staff behind the counter were helpful and patient. Everything tasted fresh and had so much flavor. Would highly recommend to any sushi lovers in the area.
Good quality foods.
Great new place - great food, fast service, good price.

I really hope this place strives. This is the only poke place near Montgomery village. Then, there's one in rio. They offer 2$ off 15 I decided not to do that on my current visit. While I was eating and I asked them if they had a tip jar.  They said no. I said really? They looked at each other like they didn't know what tip jar is. I asked them for a change of 5$ I tipped them. They said thank you. I said no problem. They are essential workers as well. I have to tip them. They offered if  I wanted a cup of water. I said sure. It was spicy lol. I gave them 4 stars because  1 staff were only wearing 1 glove not both and the other wasn't wearing any. They were friendly though. The food is fresh. I like their marinated salmon and tuna. I wasn’t a fan of the black peppered tuna, but hey maybe your tastes buds might be different than mines

Some poke places don't give you much food or cut down on the quality so it's not too expensive for them. What we just ate was great (both in quality and quantity) and we really hope they can keep up the good work!  The order we made on their website went through perfectly and they were ready at the requested time. It looked like the amount of food turnover was good so everything stayed fresh!

I tried it today and it was really good! At first I thought the bowls look small but  it actually filled me up with only half! The service was very friendly, the food is healthy and protein is cooked to order (which many other places don't) will definitely come back again soon!

Too much rice and not enough of anything else.  A little stingy with the protein. The avocodos seemed old and the mangos sat in syrup. My poke bowl was bland. A little disappointed. I bought 4 bowls at $12 a bowl.
Delicious food, delivered! So glad we discovered this place ; we will order from them again.

I ordered a carry out consisting of a raw fish bowl and a grilled chicken bowl. Both were delicious! All the ingredients, including rice were fresh. I am impressed with the quality of food for the price. I can't wait to try other options!

Great variety of ingredients for make your own poke bowl, but also quite enough suggestions on the menu for those of us, who are intimidated by a long list of ingredients. Tuna tasted good, sushi rice was perfect. They also server delicious summer drinks. Fast and friendly service to to it off — I'm happy the place is finally open!
Extremely delicious and fresh food. There are so many different options that you can choose from. The staff is very friendly. Looking forward to visit this place soon again. :)
